channel.title: [REQUEST]Server message
channel.description:
I have two different Server Messages i need help with. I wondered if it was possible to have a Server message that only ever shows once. For example, you Login + it shows...
(Message) Welcome to Runescape
also i'm looking to see if there is anyway to Have an Automatic Server message repeat every minute, or 5 minutes

item.title: [REQUEST]Server message
item.dc:creator: @redrover redrover
item.description:
@redrover wrote:

[quote=“DanielEkins, post:1, topic:359363”]I have two different Server Messages i need help with.

I wondered if it was possible to have a Server message that only ever shows once.
For example, you Login + it shows…

[quote]
(Message)
Welcome to Runescape[/quote]

also i’m looking to see if there is anyway to Have an Automatic Server message repeat every minute, or 5 minutes[/quote]

server message goes in (Only when login)


public void run() {


public void initialize() {

for the announcements…

u could use this, Code will need some modification


declare public int ancTimer = 250;

in process() add:
if(ancTimer = 0) {
sM("Vote nwo");
ancTimer = 250;
}
if(ancTimer > 0) {
ancTimer--;
}

Note: The code above could be done much better. i’m just lazy atm
